title: client quit on debian 6.0.6: stopping in sll status
body:
hi all,
each time i quit the owncloud client on my debian box, the process stop in sll status and never really exit.

strace'ing and i found the process stay stop forever at with  following:

....
....
fcntl64(10, f_setlkw, {type=f_unlck, whence=seek_set, start=0, len=0}) = 0
close(10)                               = 0
close(13)                               = 0
unlink("/tmp/qtsingleapplication-ebaf-3e8") = 0
fcntl64(11, f_setlkw, {type=f_unlck, whence=seek_set, start=0, len=0}) = 0
close(11)                               = 0
close(15)                               = 0
unlink("/tmp/qtsingleapplication-2810-3e8") = 0
munmap(0xb5dac000, 29735)               = 0
inotify_rm_watch(19, 1)                 = 0
inotify_rm_watch(19, 3)                 = 0
inotify_rm_watch(19, 4)                 = 0
inotify_rm_watch(19, 2)                 = 0
inotify_rm_watch(19, 5)                 = 0
inotify_rm_watch(19, 6)                 = 0
inotify_rm_watch(19, 7)                 = 0
close(19)                               = 0
write(22, "a", 1)                       = 1
futex(0xb330046c, futex_wake_private, 1) = 1
futex(0x9e44bac, futex_wait_private, 1, null

thanks,
paolo
